name: Steven Lopez
title: Budtender
coverLetter: Hello my name is Steven, I am 21 years old and looking for stable income as well as new experience aside from the ‘regular’ job. Working individually and with others is hand in hand for me, I can be focused on tasks on my own as well as helping and contributing to bigger projects. I enjoy being outside and keeping up good energy, wether that be with music or listening to others experiences. I work best with a task list to complete to help me focus.
experience:
• I had a seasonal job at a Theater in Hollywood (Chinese Theater). They allowed me to work for about 3 months. (most recent)
  • I worked Overnight Stocking at Target, unloading trucks and stocking up the sales floor. I maintained the job for 8 months.
  • All other experience was food related jobs, working as cashier, server, and prep.
